text: Stephenie Meyer (born December 24, 1973 in Hartford, Connecticut) is an American author. She was raised in Phoenix, Arizona. She is the author of the Twilight series. The Host, Meyer's first adult novel, was released on May 6, 2008. == Critical reception == Meyer's first novel, Twilight, has won numerous honors, including: * A New York Times Editor's Choice * A Publishers Weekly Best Book of the Year * An Amazon.com "Best Book of the Decade...So Far" * A Teen People "Hot List" pick * An American Library Association "Top Ten Best Book for Young Adults" and "Top Ten Books for Reluctant Readers‚Äù * Translation into 20 languages == References == == Other websites == * Stephenie Meyer's official website * The Twilight Series's official website * The Twilight Lexicon * Stephenie's IMDB page Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Hartford, Connecticut Category:Writers from Phoenix, Arizona
